src:
Chelsea Nyaris Kalahkan MU karena Kata-kata Pembangkit Semangat dari Lampard
01 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chelsea sudah dipastikan tersingkir dari ajang Carabao Cup. Di laga babak 16 besar yang digelar pada hari Kamis (31/10/2019) kemarin, skuat besutan Frank Lampard itu dikalahkan oleh Manchester United dengan skor tipis 1-2.
Pertandingan tersebut berjalan dengan cukup sengit. Chelsea mendominasi permainan secara penguasaan bola, sementara Manchester United lebih sering mendekam di wilayahnya sendiri dan mencari peluang menyerang balik.
MU yang berstatus sebagai tim tamu berhasil unggul pada menit ke-25 setelah Marcus Rashford mencetak gol melalui titik putih. Chelsea kerepotan untuk menyamakan kedudukan hingga wasit menutup babak pertama.
Di babak kedua, Chelsea bermain lebih baik. Mereka akhirnya berhasil menyamakan kedudukan melalui aksi Michy Batshuayi yang sensasional. Sayangnya, the Blues gagal mempertahankan momentum hingga kebobolan oleh tendangan bebas Rashford.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Chelsea almost beat MU because of the words Generating Excitement from Lampard
Nov 01 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chelsea have certainly been eliminated from the Carabao Cup. In the last 16 round match which was held on Thursday (10/31/2019) yesterday, the squad made by Frank Lampard was defeated by Manchester United with a thin score of 1-2.
The match went quite fierce. Chelsea dominate the game in possession of the ball, while Manchester United are more often languishing in their own territory and looking for opportunities to counterattack.
Manchester United status as a guest team managed to excel in the 25th minute after Marcus Rashford scored a goal through the white point. Chelsea struggled to equalize until the referee closed the first half.
In the second half, Chelsea played better. They finally managed to equalize through the sensational action of Michy Batshuayi. Unfortunately, the Blues failed to maintain momentum until they were broken by Rashford's free kick.
